content.question: The political platform outlined in the passage was a reaction to which of the following in the late twentieth century?

choices.label: The success of the European welfare state
The increasing political and economic integration of Europe

topic.text: 9.14: 20th- and 21st-Century Culture, Arts, and Demographic Trends

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
